title: Aletheia
description: This is an app that scans documents with OpenAI APIs and explains them in simple terms based on the patient's history.

title: 4-Year College Planner
description: This uses a drag and drop system and web scraping to make a 4 year for college courses at UCSC.

title: Fun Facts Sharing Website
description: Users upload fun facts, which can b upvoted and downvoted, and are sorted into categories.
